verses.verse: וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> had occurred רָעָב֙ <S%H7458><s%> And there was a famine בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִלְּבַד֙ <S%H905><s%> beside הָרָעָ֣ב <S%H7458><s%> famine הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> the first אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> had occurred בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> that was in the days אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went יִצְחָ֛ק <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲבִימֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> unto Abimelech מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines גְּרָֽרָה׃ <S%H1642><s%> unto Gerar

וַיֵּרָ֤א <S%H7200><s%> appeared אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him and said אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּרֵ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> Go not down מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt שְׁכֹ֣ן <S%H7931><s%> dwell בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> of which אֹמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> which I shall tell אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

גּ֚וּר <S%H1481><s%> Sojourn בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְאֶֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> you וַאֲבָרְכֶ֑ךָּ <S%H1288><s%> and I will be with thee and will bless כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְךָ֣ וּֽלְזַרְעֲךָ֗ <S%H2233><s%> thee for unto thee and unto thy seed אֶתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> I will give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽאֲרָצֹ֣ת <S%H776><s%> countries הָאֵ֔ל <S%H411><s%> all these וַהֲקִֽמֹתִי֙ <S%H6965><s%> and I will perform אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁבֻעָ֔ה <S%H7621><s%> the oath אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֖עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> which I sware לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham אָבִֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> thy father

וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֤י <S%H7235><s%> to multiply אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> זַרְעֲךָ֙ <S%H2233><s%> thy seed כְּכוֹכְבֵ֣י <S%H3556><s%> as the stars הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וְנָתַתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> and will give לְזַרְעֲךָ֔ <S%H2233><s%> unto thy seed אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאֲרָצֹ֖ת <S%H776><s%> countries הָאֵ֑ל <S%H411><s%> all these וְהִתְבָּרֲכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> be blessed בְזַרְעֲךָ֔ <S%H2233><s%> and in thy seed כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all גּוֹיֵ֥י <S%H1471><s%> shall all the nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

עֵ֕קֶב <S%H6118><s%> Because אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> obeyed אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> that Abraham בְּקֹלִ֑י <S%H6963><s%> my voice וַיִּשְׁמֹר֙ <S%H8104><s%> and kept מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֔י <S%H4931><s%> my charge מִצְוֹתַ֖י <S%H4687><s%> my commandments חֻקּוֹתַ֥י <S%H2708><s%> my statutes וְתוֹרֹתָֽי׃ <S%H8451><s%> and my laws
וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> dwelt יִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac בִּגְרָֽר׃ <S%H1642><s%> in Gerar

וַֽיִּשְׁאֲל֞וּ <S%H7592><s%> asked אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> the men הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> of the place לְאִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> [him] of his wife וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said אֲחֹ֣תִי <S%H269><s%> She [is] my sister הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for יָרֵא֙ <S%H3372><s%> for he feared לֵאמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> to say אִשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H802><s%> [She is] my wife פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> might יַֽהַרְגֻ֜נִי <S%H2026><s%> should kill אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> the men הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> of the place עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> account רִבְקָ֔ה <S%H7259><s%> me for Rebekah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for טוֹבַ֥ת <S%H2896><s%> because she [was] fair מַרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> to look upon הִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> It

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when אָֽרְכוּ־ <S%H748><s%> And it came to pass when he had been there a long ל֥וֹ שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> had been there הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> time וַיַּשְׁקֵ֗ף <S%H8259><s%> looked out אֲבִימֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H40><s%> that Abimelech מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines בְּעַ֖ד <S%H1157><s%> at הַֽחַלּ֑וֹן <S%H2474><s%> a window וַיַּ֗רְא <S%H7200><s%> and saw וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold יִצְחָק֙ <S%H3327><s%> and behold Isaac מְצַחֵ֔ק <S%H6711><s%> [was] sporting אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> רִבְקָ֥ה <S%H7259><s%> with Rebekah אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H802><s%> his wife

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> called אֲבִימֶ֜לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> And Abimelech לְיִצְחָ֗ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> Behold of a surety הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אִשְׁתְּךָ֙ <S%H802><s%> she [is] thy wife הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאֵ֥יךְ <S%H349><s%> How אָמַ֖רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> and how saidst אֲחֹ֣תִי <S%H269><s%> other הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because אָמַ֔רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> unto him Because I said פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> might אָמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> Lest I die עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> account

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> And Abimelech מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What זֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> you עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> What [is] this thou hast done לָּ֑נוּ כִּ֠מְעַט <S%H4592><s%> might lightly שָׁכַ֞ב <S%H7901><s%> have lien אַחַ֤ד <S%H259><s%> unto us? one הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> of the people אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אִשְׁתֶּ֔ךָ <S%H802><s%> with thy wife וְהֵבֵאתָ֥ <S%H935><s%> and thou shouldest have brought עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and אָשָֽׁם׃ <S%H817><s%> guiltiness

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> charged אֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> And Abimelech אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> all [his] people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַנֹּגֵ֜עַ <S%H5060><s%> He that toucheth בָּאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> this man הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> this וּבְאִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> or his wife מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> be put to death

וַיִּזְרַ֤ע <S%H2232><s%> sowed יִצְחָק֙ <S%H3327><s%> Then Isaac בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in that land הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> the same וַיִּמְצָ֛א <S%H4672><s%> and received בַּשָּׁנָ֥ה <S%H8141><s%> in the same year הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> the same מֵאָ֣ה <S%H3967><s%> hundred שְׁעָרִ֑ים <S%H8180><s%> hundredfold וַֽיְבָרֲכֵ֖הוּ <S%H1288><s%> blessed יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD

וַיִּגְדַּ֖ל <S%H1431><s%> waxed great הָאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> forward הָלוֹךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> and continued וְגָדֵ֔ל <S%H1431><s%> great עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> until כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָדַ֖ל <S%H1431><s%> became מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> very

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> had ל֤וֹ מִקְנֵה־ <S%H4735><s%> For he had possession צֹאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> of flocks וּמִקְנֵ֣ה <S%H4735><s%> and possession בָקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> of herds וַעֲבֻדָּ֖ה <S%H5657><s%> of servants רַבָּ֑ה <S%H7227><s%> and great store וַיְקַנְא֥וּ <S%H7065><s%> envied אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> now all הַבְּאֵרֹ֗ת <S%H875><s%> For all the wells אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which חָֽפְרוּ֙ <S%H2658><s%> had digged עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> servants אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> which his father's בִּימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> in the days אַבְרָהָ֣ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father סִתְּמ֣וּם <S%H5640><s%> had stopped פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines וַיְמַלְא֖וּם <S%H4390><s%> them and filled עָפָֽר׃ <S%H6083><s%> them with earth

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲבִימֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> And Abimelech אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִצְחָ֑ק <S%H3327><s%> unto Isaac לֵ֚ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go מֵֽעִמָּ֔נוּ <S%H5973><s%> with כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָצַֽמְתָּ־ <S%H6105><s%> mightier מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> from us for thou art much

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> departed מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there יִצְחָ֑ק <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac וַיִּ֥חַן <S%H2583><s%> thence and pitched his tent בְּנַֽחַל־ <S%H5158><s%> in the valley גְּרָ֖ר <S%H1642><s%> of Gerar וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיָּ֨שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> again יִצְחָ֜ק <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac וַיַּחְפֹּ֣ר ׀ <S%H2658><s%> digged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּאֵרֹ֣ת <S%H875><s%> the wells הַמַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> by which חָֽפְרוּ֙ <S%H2658><s%> which they had digged בִּימֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> in the days אַבְרָהָ֣ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> his father וַיְסַתְּמ֣וּם <S%H5640><s%> had stopped פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> for the Philistines אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> them after מ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> the death אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> and he called לָהֶן֙ שֵׁמ֔וֹת <S%H8034><s%> their names כַּשֵּׁמֹ֕ת <S%H8034><s%> after the names אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which קָרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> had called לָהֶ֖ן אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

וַיַּחְפְּר֥וּ <S%H2658><s%> digged עַבְדֵֽי־ <S%H5650><s%> servants יִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac's בַּנָּ֑חַל <S%H5158><s%> in the valley וַיִּ֨מְצְאוּ־ <S%H4672><s%> and found שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there בְּאֵ֖ר <S%H875><s%> there a well מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> water חַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of springing

וַיָּרִ֜יבוּ <S%H7378><s%> did strive רֹעֵ֣י <S%H7473><s%> shipherd גְרָ֗ר <S%H1642><s%> of Gerar עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with רֹעֵ֥י <S%H7473><s%> shipherd יִצְחָ֛ק <S%H3327><s%> with Isaac's לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saying לָ֣נוּ הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> The water וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> [is] ours and he called שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name הַבְּאֵר֙ <S%H875><s%> of the well עֵ֔שֶׂק <S%H6230><s%> Esek כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because הִֽתְעַשְּׂק֖וּ <S%H6229><s%> because they strove עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> they

וַֽיַּחְפְּרוּ֙ <S%H2658><s%> And they digged בְּאֵ֣ר <S%H875><s%> well אַחֶ֔רֶת <S%H312><s%> another וַיָּרִ֖יבוּ <S%H7378><s%> and strove גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> too עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> over וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> for that also and he called שְׁמָ֖הּ <S%H8034><s%> the name of it שִׂטְנָֽה׃ <S%H7856><s%> Sitnah

וַיַּעְתֵּ֣ק <S%H6275><s%> And he removed מִשָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there וַיַּחְפֹּר֙ <S%H2658><s%> from thence and digged בְּאֵ֣ר <S%H875><s%> well אַחֶ֔רֶת <S%H312><s%> another וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not רָב֖וּ <S%H7378><s%> and for that they strove עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> over וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> not and he called שְׁמָהּ֙ <S%H8034><s%> the name of it רְחֹב֔וֹת <S%H7344><s%> Rehoboth וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For עַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> For now הִרְחִ֧יב <S%H7337><s%> hath made room יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לָ֖נוּ וּפָרִ֥ינוּ <S%H6509><s%> for us and we shall be fruitful בָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land
וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> And he went up מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there בְּאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <S%H884><s%> from thence to Beersheba

וַיֵּרָ֨א <S%H7200><s%> appeared אֵלָ֤יו <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> unto him the same night הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> the same וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אָנֹכִ֕י <S%H595><s%> I אֱלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> I [am] the God אַבְרָהָ֣ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> fear כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִתְּךָ֣ <S%H854><s%> not for I [am] with אָנֹ֔כִי <S%H595><s%> I וּבֵֽרַכְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1288><s%> thee and will bless וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֣י <S%H7235><s%> thee and multiply אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> זַרְעֲךָ֔ <S%H2233><s%> thy seed בַּעֲב֖וּר <S%H5668><s%> the sake אַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham's עַבְדִּֽי׃ <S%H5650><s%> for my servant

וַיִּ֧בֶן <S%H1129><s%> And he builded שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there מִזְבֵּ֗חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar וַיִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> there and called בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> upon the name יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֶּט־ <S%H5186><s%> and pitched שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there אָהֳל֑וֹ <S%H168><s%> his tent וַיִּכְרוּ־ <S%H3738><s%> digged שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> and there עַבְדֵי־ <S%H5650><s%> servants יִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> there and there Isaac's בְּאֵֽר׃ <S%H875><s%> a well

וַאֲבִימֶ֕לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> Then Abimelech הָלַ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to him מִגְּרָ֑ר <S%H1642><s%> to him from Gerar וַאֲחֻזַּת֙ <S%H276><s%> and Ahuzzath מֵֽרֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H4828><s%> one of his friends וּפִיכֹ֖ל <S%H6369><s%> and Phichol שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> the chief captain צְבָאֽוֹ׃ <S%H6635><s%> of his army

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> and יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac מַדּ֖וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> unto them Wherefore בָּאתֶ֣ם <S%H935><s%> come אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> about וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you שְׂנֵאתֶ֣ם <S%H8130><s%> ye to me seeing ye hate אֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> וַתְּשַׁלְּח֖וּנִי <S%H7971><s%> me and have sent me away מֵאִתְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said רָא֣וֹ <S%H7200><s%> We saw רָאִינוּ֮ <S%H7200><s%> certainly כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> has been יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD עִמָּךְ֒ <S%H5973><s%> we וַנֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> was with thee and we said תְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> has been נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> now אָלָ֛ה <S%H423><s%> Let there be now an oath בֵּינוֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H996><s%> betwixt בֵּינֵ֣ינוּ <S%H996><s%> us [even] betwixt וּבֵינֶ֑ךָ <S%H996><s%> us between וְנִכְרְתָ֥ה <S%H3772><s%> us and thee and let us make בְרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> us

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> no תַּעֲשֵׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> That thou wilt do עִמָּ֜נוּ <S%H5973><s%> no רָעָ֗ה <S%H7451><s%> us no hurt כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> after לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not נְגַֽעֲנ֔וּךָ <S%H5060><s%> as we have not touched וְכַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> and עָשִׂ֤ינוּ <S%H6213><s%> thee and as we have done עִמְּךָ֙ <S%H5973><s%> nothing רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> unto thee nothing but ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good וַנְּשַׁלֵּֽחֲךָ֖ <S%H7971><s%> and have sent thee away בְּשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> thou [art] now בְּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> the blessed יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD
וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made לָהֶם֙ מִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <S%H4960><s%> them a feast וַיֹּאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> and they did eat וַיִּשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <S%H8354><s%> and drink

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֣ימוּ <S%H7925><s%> And they rose up betimes בַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיִּשָּׁבְע֖וּ <S%H7650><s%> and sware אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one לְאָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> to another וַיְשַׁלְּחֵ֣ם <S%H7971><s%> sent them away יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> and Isaac וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> departed מֵאִתּ֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> from him in peace

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it came to pass the same day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> the same וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> came עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> servants יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> that Isaac's וַיַּגִּ֣דוּ <S%H5046><s%> and told ל֔וֹ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֹד֥וֹת <S%H182><s%> him concerning הַבְּאֵ֖ר <S%H875><s%> the well אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָפָ֑רוּ <S%H2658><s%> which they had digged וַיֹּ֥אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> and said ל֖וֹ מָצָ֥אנוּ <S%H4672><s%> unto him We have found מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> water

וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> And he called אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> שִׁבְעָ֑ה <S%H7656><s%> it Shebah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> after that שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> therefore the name הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> of the city בְּאֵ֣ר שֶׁ֔בַע <S%H884><s%> [is] Beersheba עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this ס

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become עֵשָׂו֙ <S%H6215><s%> And Esau בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> was forty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> when he took אִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> to wife אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדִ֔ית <S%H3067><s%> Judith בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter בְּאֵרִ֖י <S%H882><s%> of Beeri הַֽחִתִּ֑י <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּ֣שְׂמַ֔ת <S%H1315><s%> and Bashemath בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter אֵילֹ֖ן <S%H356><s%> of Elon הַֽחִתִּֽי׃ <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite
וַתִּהְיֶ֖יןָ <S%H1961><s%> brought מֹ֣רַת <S%H4786><s%> Which were a grief ר֑וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> of mind לְיִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> unto Isaac וּלְרִבְקָֽה׃ <S%H7259><s%> and to Rebekah ס
